name: Funny Meme Game
description:
Funny Meme Game is a fan game of Filthy Frank, Idubbbz, H3H3, Max Moe Foe, and Anything4Views.

Filthy Frank is trying to move on to something greater than memes, but his friends don't like this idea. Filthy Frank's teammates have been taken captive by his former allies. Rescue your teammates and leave meme world! 

Created by Tomas Abrams, Shane Barner, and Dalton Barnett as a final project for a game development course.
